<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a diary entry. Supported tags and their parameters: <ext><name>spoiler</name><attr/><inner>
{{{!}} class{{=}}"bikitable sortable"
! Tag
!class{{=}}"unsortable" {{!}} Options
{{!}}-
{{!}} img
{{!}}
* ''image'': [[String]] - path to image. When present, any element with it will be displayed as image.
* ''width'': [[Number]] - image width in pixels.
* ''height'': [[Number]] - image height in pixels.
{{!}}-
{{!}} font
{{!}}
* ''color'': [[String]] - [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML_color HTML color] in format #aarrggbb or #rrggbb
* ''size'': [[Number]] - font height in pixels.
* ''face'': [[String]] - font type (class from CfgFontFamilies)
{{!}}-
{{!}} br
{{!}} {{n/a}}
{{!}}-
{{!}} marker
{{!}}
* ''name'': [[String]] - marker name
{{!}}-
{{!}} execute
{{!}}
* ''expression'': [[String]] - executed code
{{!}}-
{{!}} executeClose
{{!}}
* ''expression'': [[String]] - executed code, diary is closed afterwards
{{!}}-
{{!}} [[createDiaryLink|log]]
{{!}}
* ''subject'': [[String]] - [[createDiarySubject|subject]] name.
* ''record'': [[String]] - record name (e.g. "Record6" or "Unit1059524")
{{!}}-
{{!}} gear
{{!}}
* ''unit'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} teamSwitch
{{!}}
* ''unit'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} kick
{{!}}
* ''id'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} ban
{{!}}
* ''id'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} mute
{{!}}
* ''id'': [[Number]] - unit ID
{{!}}-
{{!}} currentTask
{{!}}
* ''id'': [[Number]] - task ID
{{!}}}</inner><close></spoiler></close></ext>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> If [[createDiaryRecord]] command fails, it returns null record, but since there is no null record unary command, you can make a variable and compare against it.
 [[private]] _nullRecord <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[objNull]] [[createDiaryRecord]] [];
 [[if]] ([[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["title", "description"]] [[isEqualTo]] _nullRecord) [[then]] { [[hint]] "Failed" };
</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName [[createDiaryRecord]] [subject, text, task, taskState, showTitle] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> subject: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> task: (optional): [[Task]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> taskState: (optional): [[String]] - Changes the state of the given task. Can be "CANCELED", "ASSIGNED", "FAILED", "CREATED", "SUCCEEDED"</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> showTitle (Optional): [[Boolean]] - Title visibility. Default: [[true]] <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER6</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Diary Record]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unitName [[createDiaryRecord]] [subject, [title, text], task, stateState, showTitle] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> subject: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> title: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> text: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> task: (optional): [[Task]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER25</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p26</name>=<value> taskState: (optional): [[String]] - Changes the state of the given task. Can be "CANCELED", "ASSIGNED", "FAILED", "CREATED", "SUCCEEDED" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER26</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p27</name>=<value> showTitle (Optional): [[Boolean]] - Title visibility. Default: [[true]] <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER27</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Diary Record]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Intel", "Enemy base is on grid <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><marker name='enemyBase'>161170</marker></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"]]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", "Information gathered.<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><br />&lt;img image='wellDone_ca.paa' /&gt;</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["No Title", "description"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Font tag","<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><font color='#7FFF00' size='30' face='TahomaB'>This will changed text size, colour and font</font></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "",[[false]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Image", "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><img image='\A3\Ui_F_Curator\Data\Logos\arma3_curator_artwork.jpg' width='500' height='800'/></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x6</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Linebreak","<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>Line1<br></br>Line2<br></br><br></br>Line4</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE6</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x7</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["Execute","<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><execute expression='hint ""Some code"";'>Some text</execute></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE7</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x8</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["Diary", ["ExecuteClose", "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><executeClose expression=""hint 'Diary closed';"">Close Diary</executeClose></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"], [[taskNull]], "", [[false]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE8</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[processDiaryLink]], [[createDiaryLink]], [[createDiarySubject]], [[diarySubjectExists]], [[setDiaryRecordText]], [[removeDiaryRecord]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 24, 2017 - 20:11 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
When adding multiple diary records, be aware that they appear in reverse order. ie the first one you add will appear last and the last one you add will be first.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 21, 2018 - 08:21 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Kalthramis|Kalthramis]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
To add an entry under the 'Briefing' subject, which is available by default, use "Diary" as the subject. 
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 22, 2019 - 16:28 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:R3vo|R3vo]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
It seems that the '''task''' parameter has no effect because the task entry in the briefing menu is created when the task itself was created.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
